title: Blended Methodology-Based mHealth Education for Prenatal Health Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Acquisition of practical prenatal health management skills in a microlearning environment accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can establish and implement a personalized prenatal health behavior plan using an mHealth application at least three times per week.
Learners can identify core health information (nutrition, exercise, stress management) by pregnancy stage with over 90% accuracy in a mobile environment.
Learners acquire foundational competencies to analyze the cultural fit of mHealth technologies using a UTAUT model-based evaluation tool.

resources: Learning Management System (LMS) with Real-Time Chat Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
